short_summary: Two (2) Facilitator consultants required for facilitated engagement activities
description: The requirement is for the services of two (2) Facilitator consultants for the Net-Zero Advisory Board (NZAB) to conduct facilitated engagement activities to support the delivery of the NZAB's mandate.
full_summary:
[Introduction]
# TSPS 2.15 Facilitation Services Solicitation 

The Government of Canada has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) [$ solicitationNumber] titled `TSPS 2.15 Facilitation Services` under the Trade Agreement category. 

## Brief Description

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) requires the services of two (2) professional facilitators to conduct facilitated engagement activities to support the delivery of the Net-Zero Advisory Board (NZAB) mandate. This RFP is open to qualifying Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS.

## About this Solicitation

This solicitation is subject to two (2) refresh cycles every quarter. It has been placed under the Trade Agreement category. The contract period is 12 months renewable with a maximum of 4 (four) additional periods of one (1) year each.

## Key Details

| Key Detail | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Trade Agreement | WTO Agreement on Government Procurement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement |
| Level of Security | No security clearance required |
| Proposed Contract Period | From contract award to March 31, 2024, with 4 additional periods of one (1) year |
| Regions of Opportunity | National Capital Region (NCR) |
| Contracting Authority | Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) |

## More Information

Those interested in this Solicitation should refer to [Solicitation Document]. Following the instructions in the document carefully will ensure timely consideration.

For more information, please contact [Trade Agreement Information] at [contactInfoEmail].

Note: This information can be found in the attached document as well.
